content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump(position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Water supply system
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump(position x=107.5, y=-33.5)
- Pipe group(fluid system=742, position=x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Steam supply system
Consists of following entities
- Boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Pipe group(fluid system=746, position=x=117.5, y=-34.5)

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of following entities
- Small electric pole(position x=119.5, y=-30.5)
- Electricity group(id=31, poles=[(x=119.5,y=-30.5)], voltage=0)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item function
- Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before calling the insert_item function
### Errors when getting entities
- Make sure the entity exists at the specified position before trying to get it
### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure the entities are compatible and can be connected before calling the connect_entities function
### Errors when accessing entity attributes
- Make sure the entity has the attribute you are trying to access before trying to access it

# NAMESPACE
### Defined functions
- insert_item: Inserts an item into an entity
- get_entity: Gets an entity at a specified position
- connect_entities: Connects two entities
### Important variables
- coal: The amount of coal in the inventory (type: int)
- wood: The amount of wood in the inventory (type: int)
- iron_ore: The amount of iron ore in the inventory (type: int)
- copper_ore: The amount of copper ore in the inventory (type: int)
- iron_plate: The amount of iron plate in the inventory (type: int)
- copper_plate: The amount of copper plate in the inventory (type: int)
- copper_cable: The amount of copper cable in the inventory (type: int)
- iron_gear_wheel: The amount of iron gear wheel in the inventory (type: int)
